Located in the Darjeeling district, between Mirik and Ghum. Nearest railway station is New Jalpaiguri. Nearest Airport is Bagdogra.
Hired cars available from NJP and Siliguri.
Kachenjunga Peak of the Himalayan Range. Salamandar Project.

Only place to stay is the DGHC Lodge. Presently there are 2 suites and 2 double bedrooms. Another 21 rooms are under construction. Dormitory is under maintenance. Fooding available at reasonable cost.

Reservation can be done from the following places:
:[1] DGHC Tourism, Bhanu Sarani, Darjeeling Mall. Ph: 0354-2254214.
:[2] DGHC Tourist Reception Centre, Tenging Norgay Road, Siliguri. Ph: 0353-2518680.
:[3] DGHC Counter, 4 Shakespear Sarani, Kolkata. Ph: 033 2821715.
Nearby locality is Sukhiapokhri. Township Darjeeling is around 21 km. Ghum 13.5 km, Siliguri 85 km, Mirik 23 km, Lepcha Gajat is 5.5 km.
